summary: THE REAR BRAKE LIGHTS DID NOT ILLUMINATE WHEN THE BRAKE WAS APPLIED.  *NLM   THE BRAKE LIGHT SWITCH WAS REPLACED 4 TIMES WHICH ONE OUT OF THE 4 REPAIRS WAS RECALL RELATED.  ALSO THE ABS LIGHT WAS ILLUMINATED.  ONCE THE SWITCH FAILED THE SHIFTER WOULD NOT COME OUT OF PARK POSITION.  ON ANOTHER OCCASION, THE SUN ROOF WAS INOPERATIVE.    *TT
